info.title: ORB Browser Plugin
info.description: The ORBBrowser plugin provides web browsing functionality based on the WebKit engine.

useragent.description: The UserAgent used during communication with the web server

url.description: The URL that is loaded upon starting the browser

injectedbundle.description: The name of the .so loaded to extend the HTML5 with customized JavaScript handlers

cookiestorage.description: Post-fixed path to the persistent location on where cookies will be stored

localstorage.description: Post-fixed path to the persistent location on where local-storage will be stored

certificatecheck.description: If enabled, SSL certificate error will lead to a page error

dumpOptions.description: Dump options: 0 = None, 1 = Overridden only, 2 = All, 3 = Verbose

secure.description: If false, every domain can access any other domain, otherwise fill in fields in whitelist definition table

origin.description: Origin domain allowed to access domains in domain

items.description: Domain allowed to access from origin

subdomain.description: whether it is also OK to access subdomains of domains listed in domain

logtosystemconsoleenabled.summary: Enable page loging to system console (stderr)

watchdogchecktimeoutinseconds.summary: How often to check main event loop for responsiveness (0 - disable)

watchdoghangthresholdtinseconds.summary: The amount of time to give a process to recover before declaring a hang state
